heading: us v. microsoft: timeline
subheading: key dates in the microsoft antitrust trial.
author: wired news report
text: a little hazy on events? for those who snuck out in the middle, or have simply forgotten about things during the hiatus, here's a cheat sheet of key moments in the antitrust trial of us v. microsoft. also:judge jackson's findings of factjudge: 'gates was main culprit'judge lowers boom on msmicrosoft keeps its dukes upwho thinks what about thatms: heavy trading, heavy talkin praise or contempt of msongoing us v. microsoft coverage
